Journal.Title: Yao xue xue bao = Acta pharmaceutica Sinica

Article.ArticleTitle: [Determination of peimine and peiminine in Fritillaria thunbergii by HPLC-ELSD].

AbstractText: To determine peimine and peiminine in Fritillaria drug simultaneously by RP-HPLC-ELSD.

HPLC was carried out with a Waters Alliance, Model 2690, equipped with XTerra RP18 column (150 mm x 3.9 mm ID, 5 microm) and evaporated light scattering detector. The mobile phase (acetonitrile-10 mmol.L(-1) NH4HCO3 adjusted to pH 10.10 by ammonia solution) was eluted in gradient mode.
The recoveries of peimine and peiminine were 98.96% (n = 4), with RSD 1.01% and 98.40% (n = 4), with RSD 2.63%, respectively.
The method is simple, sensitive and reliable. It can be used for quantitative determination of Fritillaria drug.
